Mr. Frank M. MerklÂ©in
March 3, 1966
- 2 -
We sincerely hope that it will be our privilege to welcome
Time-Life Broadcast, Inc. to our Association as a Sustaining
Associate. If your company decides to affiliate with the NAEB,
all we would need from you is an official letter notifying us of
your decision. An application for Individual membership in the
NAEB is also enclosed since you evinced an interest in a personal
membership.
If, after reviewing the enclosed materials, you should have any
further questions about the NAEB, please do not hesitate to contact
Sincerely,
Harold E. Hill
Enel.
